title: Map an Object to an Array
description: In this lab, we will learn how to map an object to an object array using the listify() function in JavaScript. The function uses Object.entries() and Array.prototype.reduce() to map the object and mapFn to map the keys and values of the object. By the end of this lab, you will be able to efficiently map objects to arrays using JavaScript.

meta.title: Mapping Objects to Arrays in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to efficiently map objects to arrays using the listify() function in JavaScript.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, listify, javascript practice online, array mapping, javascript lab, object mapping, javascript tutor, object entries

steps.title: Map an Object to an Array
